SELECT DISTINCT A.ActivityCode AS mainCode, A.BIN_PromotionActGrpID AS mainClassID, ISNULL(B.GroupCode,'0') AS subjectCode, ISNULL(B.GroupName,'0') AS subjectName, A.ActivityName AS mainName, A.Times AS maxReceiveQty, A.ChangeableFlag AS mainModify, A.BIN_BrandInfoID AS brandInfoID, A.BIN_OrganizationInfoID AS bin_OrganizationInfoID, A.ActivitySetBy AS userID, A.ActivityType AS activityType, A.NeedBuyFlag AS needBuyFlag, B.ActivityType AS activityGrpType, B.ReserveBeginDate AS reserveBeginDate, B.ReserveEndDate AS reserveEndDate, B.ActivityBeginDate AS activityBeginDate, B.ActivityEndDate AS activityEndDate, C.BIN_PromotionActivityRuleID AS prmRuleId, D.BasePropValue1 AS startTime, D.BasePropValue2 AS endTime FROM Promotion.BIN_PromotionActivity A WITH(NOLOCK) Left JOIN Promotion.BIN_PromotionActGrp B WITH(NOLOCK) ON (A.BIN_PromotionActGrpID = B.BIN_PromotionActGrpID) JOIN Promotion.BIN_PromotionActivityRule C WITH(NOLOCK) ON(A.BIN_PromotionActivityID = C.BIN_PromotionActivityID AND C.ValidFlag = '1') JOIN Promotion.BIN_PromotionRuleCondition D WITH(NOLOCK) ON(C.BIN_PromotionActivityRuleID = D.BIN_PromotionActivityRuleID AND D.ValidFlag = '1') JOIN Promotion.BIN_PromotionBaseProp E WITH(NOLOCK) ON(D.BIN_PromotionBasePropID = E.BIN_PromotionBasePropID AND E.PropertyName = 'baseProp_time') WHERE A.BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #bin_OrganizationInfoID# AND A.BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoID# AND (A.TemplateFlag IS NULL OR A.TemplateFlag='0' OR A.TemplateFlag ='') AND (A.Status is null OR A.Status = '1')
A.ActivityCode = #mainCode#
AND (A.SendFlag = '2' OR (A.SendFlag < '2' AND SUBSTRING(D.BasePropValue1,0,11) <= #busDate# AND SUBSTRING(D.BasePropValue2,0,11) >= #busDate2#)) AND A.ValidFlag = '1'
